alert.note: Alert for Nelson; Spencer (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 11:29AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SPENCER AND NORTHEASTERN NELSON COUNTIES THROUGH NOON EDT... At 1128 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm west of Taylorsville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Taylorsville, Bloomfield, Wakefield, Yoder, Highgrove, Waterford and Lenore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
